name: Molekule
0:
”"Alexa, set Kitchen purifier to two"”
”"Alexa, set mode of Kitchen purifier to quiet"”
”"Alexa, turn on Kitchen purifier"”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: molecule purifier
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Molekule has reinvented the air purifier using its groundbreaking PECO technology to destroy the widest range of pollutants compared to conventional purifiers. 

Use Alexa to control the fan speed and power of your Molekule device. For supported models, Alexa also allows you to set the fan mode, request current air quality, and filter health information. The Molekule skill supports the Molekule Air Pro, Molekule Air Mini+, Molekule Air Mini, and Molekule Air purifiers. Commands vary based on which purifier you have.

Example commands (all purifiers): 

Set fan speed: "Alexa, set Kitchen purifier to two"
Power on/off: "Alexa, turn on Kitchen purifier"

For Air Pro & Air Mini+ only:

Set fan mode: "Alexa, set mode of Kitchen purifier to standard/silent/quiet"
Request indoor air quality (IAQ): " Alexa, ask Molekule purifier to get the air quality for Kitchen purifier."
Provide Filter Health Details: “Ask Molekule purifier to get filter health of Kitchen purifier”

Download the Molekule mobile app here & create an account: 
iOS App Store Link: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/molekule-air-purifier/id1219881640
Google Play Store Link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.molekule.android

For additional support, please visit: help.molekule.com
